definition: Buddhist nun/(often used in phonetic spellings)
to pick/to pluck/to collect/to select/to choose/to gather
color/complexion/looks/variant of 彩[cai3]/variant of 採|采[cai3]

sentences.english: Nevertheless, Nietzsche was firmly against Scientism.
sentences.chinese: 但是，尼采坚决反对唯科学主义。

sentences.english: and Nietzsche were kings of the aphorism.
sentences.chinese: 和尼采这样的哲学家们是警句之王。

sentences.english: The work of Bellini and Donizetti was immensely popular at this time.
sentences.chinese: 贝利尼和多尼采蒂的作品在这段时期极受欢迎。

sentences.english: You'll see it when we get to the chapter on Nietzsche.
sentences.chinese: 上到关于尼采的那章时还会讲。

sentences.english: The paper also proposes some corrections of misunderstandings and misinterpretations of Niezsche's political philosophy.
sentences.chinese: 论文纠正了对尼采政治观点的某些错误理解和说明。

sentences.english: That is why Nietzsche called the idea of eternal return the heaviest of burdens (das schwerste Gewicht).
sentences.chinese: 这就是为什么尼采说永恒回归是最沉重的负担吧。

sentences.english: Mr Thompson is Nitze’s grandson. But he does not play favourites.
sentences.chinese: 虽然汤普森是尼采的孙子，可他并不偏袒汤普森。

sentences.english: Were you converted in a lecture-room?
sentences.chinese: 你是在演讲厅里皈依尼采学说的吗？

sentences.english: What does Nietzsche have to share with Li Bai?
sentences.chinese: 尼采和李白有共同语言吗？

sentences.english: Nietzsches will to power stems from Schopenhauer s Survival Will.
sentences.chinese: 尼采的权力意志论源于叔本华的生存意志论。

sentences.english: Dionysian Spirit is a major concept of Nietzsche's philosophy.
sentences.chinese: 酒神精神是尼采的一个重要概念。

sentences.english: That is why Nietzsche called the idea of eternal return the heaviest of burdens (das schwerste Gewicht).
sentences.chinese: 这就是尼采说永劫回归观是最沉重的负担的原因吧。

sentences.english: Certainly, both Nietzsche and Bataille perceived repetition as something naturally given.
sentences.chinese: 当然，尼采和巴塔耶即将重复看作是自然给定的。

sentences.english: Youth Nietzsche's cultural view is of existentialism.
sentences.chinese: 青年尼采的文化观是生存论性质的。

sentences.english: Nietzsche’s love for Wagner had a similar beginning, and a similar end to his love of God.
sentences.chinese: 尼采对瓦格纳之爱的始末缘由，与其对上帝之爱相似。

sentences.english: Moreover, Imam Sa's Quotations also alienates from Nietzsche's thoughts.
sentences.chinese: 同时，它又对尼采的思想与创作构思有所疏离。

definition: Georg Wilhelm Friedrich Hegel (1770-1831), German philosopher
Baruch or Benedict Spinoza (1632-1677), rationalist philosopher
Fyodor Mikhailovich Dostoevsky (1821-1881), great Russian novelist, author of Crime and Punishment 罪與罰|罪与罚[Zui4 yu3 Fa2]
pinyin: Tuo2 si1 tuo3 ye1 fu1 si1 ji1
